S03n249:4: bodhisattvaḥ kila sālabakulapiyālahintālatamālanaktamālavidulaniculakṣipabahule śiṃśapātiniśaśamīpalāśaśākakuśavaṃśaśaravaṇagahane kadambasarjārjunadhavakhadirakuṭajanicite vividhavallīpratānāvaguṇṭhitabahutaruviṭape rurupṛṣatasṛmaracamaragajagavaya mahiṣahariṇanyaṅkuvarāhadvīpitarakṣuvyāghravṛkasiṃharkṣādimṛgavicarite manuṣyasaṃpātavirahite mahatyaraṇyavanapradeśe tatpakāñcanojjvalavarṇaḥ sukumāraromā nānāvidhapadmarāgendranīlamarakatavaiḍūryaruciravarṇabinduvidyotitavicitragātraḥ snigdhābhinīlavimalavipulanayano manīmayairivāparuṣaprabhairviṣāṇakṣurapradeśaiḥ paramadarśanīyarūpo ratnākara iva pādacārī rurumṛgo babhūva |
S03n249:5: sa jānānaḥ svasya vapuṣo'tilobhanīyatāṃ tanukāruṇyatāṃ ca janasya nirjanasaṃpāteṣu vanagahaneṣvabhireme,
S03n249:6: paṭuvijñānatvācca tatra tatra vyādhajanaviracitāni yantrakūṭavāgurāpāśāvapātalepakāṣṭhanivāpabhojanāni samyak pariharannanugāminaṃ ca mṛgasārthamavabodhayannācārya iva piteva ca mṛgāṇāmādhipatyaṃ cakāra |
S03n249:8: svahitānveṣiṇi jane kutra nāma na pūjyate ||1 ||
S03n249:9: atha sa kadācinmahātmā tasmin vanagahane vāsopagatastatsamīpavāhinyā navāmbupurṇayā mahavegayā nadyā hriyamāṇasya puruṣasyākranditaśabdaṃ śuśrāva |
S03n249:11: abhidhāvata dīnavatsalāḥ kṛpaṇaṃ tārayituṃ javena mām ||2 ||
S03n249:13: na ca gādhamavāpyate kvacittadayaṃ māṃ samayo'bhidhāvitum ||3 ||
S03n249:14: atha bodhisattvastena tasya karuṇenākranditaśabdena hṛdiva samabhihanyamāno mā bhairmā bhairiti janmaśatābhyastāṃ bhayaviṣādadainyaśramāpanodinīmāmreḍitābhiniṣpīḍitaspaṣṭapadāmuccairmānuṣīṃ vācaṃ visṛjaṃstasmādvanagahanādviniṣpapāt |
S03n249:15: dūrata eva ca taṃ puruṣamiṣṭamivopāyanamānīyamānaṃ salilaughena dadarśa |
S03n249:17: sa tāṃ nadīṃ bhīmarayāṃ jagāhevimokṣobhayan vīra ivārisenām ||4 ||
S03n249:18: āvṛtya mārga vapuṣātha tasya māmāśrayasveti tamabhyuvāca |
S03n249:25: gaccheti taṃ sa visasarja nivedya mārgam ||7 ||
S03n249:26: atha sa puruṣaḥ snigdhabāndhavasuhṛjjanadurlabhena tena tasyādbhutenābhyupapattisaumukheyan samāvarjitahṛdayastayā cāsya rūpaśobhayā samutthāpyamānavismayabahumānaḥ praṇamyainaṃ tattatpriyamuvāca-
S03n249:28: nālaṃ kartumidaṃ karma madarthe yatkṛtaṃ tvayā || 8 ||
S03n249:34: na citrarūpā sujane kṛtajñatā nisargasiddhaiva hi tasya sā sthitiḥ |
S03n249:35: jagattu dṛṣṭvā samudīrṇavikriyaṃ kṛtajñatāpyadya guṇeṣu gaṇyate ||11 ||
S03n249:36: yatastvāṃ bravīmi kṛtamidamanusmaratā bhavatā nāyamarthaḥ kasmaicinnivedyaḥ īdṛśenāsmi sattvaviśeṣeṇottārita iti |
S03n249:47: sa tatheti pratiśrutya praṇamya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ svagṛhamabhyajagāma |
S03n249:48: tena khalu samayena tatrānyatamasya rājño devī satyasvapnā babhūva |
S03n249:51: sā kathācinnidrāvaśamupagatā pratyuṣasamaye svapnaṃ paśyati sma sarvaratnasamāhāramiva śriyā jvalantaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ rurumṛgaṃ sarājikayā parṣadā parivṛtaṃ vispaṣṭākṣarapadanyasena mānuṣeṇa vacasā dharmaṃ deśayantam |
S03n249:52: vismayā kṣiptahṛdayā ca bhartuḥ prabodhapaṭahadhvaninā saha sā vyabudhyata |
S03n249:56: nivedya ca taṃ svapnātiśayaṃ rājñe sādaraṃ punaruvāca-
S03n249:57: tatsādhu tāvatkiryatāṃ mṛgasya tasyopalambhaṃ prati deva yatnaḥ |
S03n249:58: antaḥpuraṃ ratnamṛgeṇa tena tārāmṛgeṇeva nabho virājet ||15 ||
S03n249:59: atha sa rājā dṛṣṭapratyayastasyāḥ svapnadarśanasya pratigṛhya tadvacanaṃ tatpriyakāmyayā ratnamṛgādhigamalobhācca tasya mṛgasyānveṣaṇārthaṃ sarvaṃ vyādhagaṇaṃ samādideśa |
S03n249:65: atha sa puruṣastāṃ ghoṣaṇāṃ punaḥ punarupaśrutya-
S03n249:78: iti niścitamatirvismṛtya taṃ rurumṛgasyopakāraṃ samupetya rājānamuvāca-ahaṃ deva taṃ mṛgavaramadhivāsaṃ cāsya jānāmi |
S03n249:80: tacchrutvā sa rājā pramuditamanāḥ-mamaivainaṃ bhadra pradarśayetyuktvā mṛgayāprayāṇānurūpaṃ veṣamāsthāya mahatā balakāyena parivṛtaḥ puravarānnirgamya tena puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastaṃ nadītīramupajagāma |
S03n249:81: parikṣipya ca tadvanagahanaṃ samagreṇa balakāyena dhanvī hastāvāpi vyavasitāptapuruṣaparivṛtaḥ sa rājā tenaiva puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastadvanagahanamanupraviveśa |
S03n249:82: atha sa puruṣastaṃ rurumṛgaṃ viśvastasthitamālokya pradarśayāmāsa rājñe-ayamayaṃ deva sa mṛgavaraḥ |
S03n249:89: atha sa rājā tatpradarśitena mārgeṇa rurusaṃdarśanakutūhale nayane vicikṣepa |
S03n249:91: guṇairuruṃ taṃ sa ruruṃ dadarśa śātahnadaṃ vahnimivābhramakṣe ||20 ||
S03n249:94: atha bodhisattvaḥ samantato janakolāhalamupaśrutya vyaktaṃ samantātparivṛtto'smīti niścitamatirvyaddhukāmamupārūḍhaṃ cāvetya rājānaṃ nāyamapayānakāla iti viditvā viśadapadākṣareṇa mānuṣeṇa vacasā rājānamābabhāṣe-
S03n249:98: asāvatra mṛgo'stīti ko nu te māṃ nyavedayat ||23 ||
S03n249:99: atha sa rājā tasyādbhūtena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇa bhṛśataramāvarjitahṛdayastamasmai puruṣaṃ śarāgreṇa nirdideśa-ayamasyātyadbhutasya no darśayiteti |
S03n249:100: atha bodhisattvastaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyabhijñāya vigarhamāṇa uvāca-kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ |
S03n249:105: atha sa rājā kiṃ nu khalvayamevaṃ vijugupsata iti samutpannakautūhalaḥ sāvegastaṃ rurumuvāca-
S03n249:111: nāyaṃ vigarhādara eva rājan kutsārhametattvavagamya karma |
S03n249:112: nāyaṃ punaḥ kartumiti vyavasyettīkṣṇākṣaraṃ tena mayaivamuktam ||28 ||
S03n249:113: ko hi kṣate kṣāramivāvasiñced rūkṣākṣaraṃ viskhaliteṣu vākyam |
S03n249:114: priye tu putre'pi cikitsakasya pravartate vyādhivaśāccikitsā ||29 ||
S03n249:116: tato bhayaṃ māṃ nṛvaredamāgataṃ na khalvasatsaṃgatamasti bhūtaye ||30 ||
S03n249:117: atha sa rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ tīkṣṇayā dṛṣṭyā nirbhartsanarūkṣamavekṣyovāca-satyamare re purā tvamanenaivamāpanno'bhyuddhṛta iti ?
S03n249:118: atha sa puruṣaḥ samāpatitabhayaviṣādasvedavaivarṇyadainyo hrīmandaṃ satyamityavocat |
S03n249:119: atha sa rājā dhik tvāmityenamavabhartysayan dhanuṣi śaraṃ saṃdhāyābravīt-mā tāvadbhoḥ !
S03n249:120: evaṃvidhenāpi pariśrameṇa mṛdūkṛtaṃ yasya na nāma cetaḥ |
S03n249:123: atha bodhisattvaḥ karuṇayā mahatyā samuparudhyamānahṛdayastadantarā sthitvā rājānamuvāca-alamalaṃ mahārāja hataṃ hatvā |
S03n249:125: hatastadeveha yaśaḥparikṣayād dhruvaṃ paratrāpi ca dharmasaṃkṣayāt ||32 ||
S03n249:128: ataḥ kṛpāmatra kurūṣva mā ruṣaṃ yadīpsitaṃ caivamanena kiṃcana |
S03n249:129: kiruṣva tenainamavandhyasāhasaṃ sthitaṃ tvadājñāpravaṇaṃ hi me śiraḥ ||34 ||
S03n249:130: atha sa rājā tena tasyāpakāriṇyapi sadayatvenākṛtakena ca tatpratyupakārādareṇa paramavismitamatirjātaprasādaḥ sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇastaṃ ruruvaramuvāca-sādhu sādhu mahābhāga !
S03n249:133: yenānukampyastu tavaiṣa jālmo hetuśca naḥ sajjanadarśanasya |
S03n249:136: tadājñāpaya yāvadiha saṃgamanaprayojanena tavopayogaṃ gacchāma iti |
S03n249:137: atha sa rājā taṃ ruruṃ gurumiva rathavaramāropya mahatā satkāreṇa puravaraṃ praveśya kṛtātithisatkāraṃ mahati siṃhāsane niveśya samutsāhayamānaḥ sāntaḥpuro'mātyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ prītibahumānasaumyamudīkṣamāṇo dharmaṃ papraccha-
S03n249:138: dharmaṃ prati manuṣyāṇāṃ bahudhā buddhayo gatāḥ |
S03n249:139: niścayastava dharme tu yathā taṃ vaktumarhasi ||37 ||
S03n249:140: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñaḥ saparṣatkasya sphuṭamadhuracitrākṣareṇa vacasā dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa-
S03n249:141: dayāṃ sattveṣu manye'haṃ dharmaṃ saṃkṣepato nṛpa |
S03n249:144: ātmanīva dayā syāccetsvajane vā yathā jane |
S03n249:149: suvṛṣṭiriva sasyāni guṇān sā hi prasūyate ||41 ||
S03n249:151: śucau tasmin vāṇī vrajati vikṛtaṃ naiva ca tanuḥ |
S03n249:155: dayāvān viśvāsyo bhavati jagatāṃ bāndhava iva |
S03n249:158: saṃkṣepeṇa dayāmataḥ sthiratayā paśyanti dharmaṃ buddhāḥ
S03n249:159: ko nāmāsti guṇaḥ sa sādhudayito yo nānuyāto dayām |
S03n249:160: tasmātputra ivātmanīva ca dayāṃ nītvā prakarṣaṃ jane
S03n249:162: atha sa rājā samabhinandya tattasya vacanaṃ sayaurajānapado dharmaparāyaṇo babhūva |
